page.title: 09Caversham Park Village
page.content: The safety at Caversham Park is very good.There are numerous paths leading to minor Roads and there are only two main Roads which are not normally very busy. There is a centre for a play group and ballet also. In about 1982 a new youth wing was built and every year about 2_3 plays are put on as well as a pantomime at Christmas.In the youth wing there is roller_booting as well as a drama club.In the holidays there are many activities for children such as music, drama, sewing and knitting for girls and football or cricket for boys. Sometimes as a group they go out to the swimming pool or to a musem. There is a duck pond round by the schools where children often go to search for tadpoles and snails for nature study.
